name: GitHub
description: Web-based hosting service for Git repositories offering collaboration features like pull requests, actions for CI/CD, project boards, and security scanning
features: Repository hosting with unlimited public repositories
GitHub Pages for static site hosting
pros: Free for public repositories and small teams
cons: Paid plans can be expensive for larger teams
Some enterprise features only available at higher tiers
Limited built-in project management compared to dedicated tools

pricing.details: Free for public repositories and basic features. Team plan at $4/user/month, Enterprise plan at $21/user/month for advanced features.
